title: 8 days now and support still hasn't dealt with my ticket.
body: I am now getting a single copy paste response per day and my ticket is going no where. Any way I can speak to a real person and get this issue dealt with at an increased rate?

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and it looks like you currently have two tickets open.  One of them is already being addressed directly by an account specialist.  Continue corresponding with him, and he'll be happy to help!  Good luck!

That's the problem. I am getting a single copy and paste answer per day making this process incredibly slow. Is there no way to get more than one reply per day so I am not sitting here for 2 weeks trying to get an actual answer?

Trust me i've tried complaining about this, they don't help you at all. I've been back and forth three times, with waiting on a response for 6 days that didn't even help me, my problem still exists from 9-10 days ago.
